node.title: Two people found dead at Christchurch house
node.description: A police investigation is underway after two people were found dead at a property in the Christchurch suburb of Riccarton last night.
node.content:
["A police investigation is underway after two people were found dead at a property in the Christchurch suburb of Riccarton last night.", "", "
\nPhoto: RNZ / Marika Khabazi\n
", "In a statement, police said they were called to an address on Ayr Street just before 6pm where they located two bodies on arrival.", "Police said a crime scene examination was underway and a scene guard was in place.", "Due to the early stage of the investigation, police said they were limited in what they could say about the incident."]
